name: BAL Solid (Alpha) - A Relaxing Ball Physic Puzzle Game
name_original: BAL Solid (Alpha) - A Relaxing Ball Physic Puzzle Game
description:
The Game Will be updated every week.

The Game you will download will have 45 test Levels.

Things still need to fill in:

  1. Quotes on some levels, that Teaches about life.
  2. Sound SFX and BGM
  3. ART style improvement
  4. UI UX
  5. Add 30+ Fun Levels.

Your feedback and suggestion will be appreciated and useful for the game in development.

Game Description

Help BAL to reach its destination in this Physics Puzzle journey in 70++ levels

BAL Solid is Casual Physics puzzle. The Key to complete the puzzle is by knowing WHAT & WHEN.


Follow Me on Twitter for Any Updates.
